amendment.description: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce the salary of Jennifer M. Granholm, Secretary of the Department of Energy, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 247 (Roll no. 551).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 247 (Roll no. 551).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
